data.name: Holdfast: Frontlines WW1 - Ottoman Forces
data.detailed_description:
Fight with the bravest of the brave for God and glory! In defence of their homeland, take up arms with the 57'nci Piyade Alayı to fend off the invader. The faith of the Ottoman Empire rests in your hands.

Content present in Holdfast DLCs is purely cosmetic. It doesn’t and never will impact gameplay. Your kind generosity will be put to good use and bring this genre of roleplay warfare games which all of us are fond of in the limelight.

Ottoman Forces DLC Unlocks


● Unlock the Ottoman Forces' 57'nci Piyade Alayı Riflemen uniform for the Central Powers.

● Unlock the Ottoman Forces' 57'nci Piyade Alayı Officer uniform for the Central Powers.

● Unique voice-acted cheers, shouts, and insults when playing as the Ottomans.

data.short_description: Fight with the bravest of the brave from the 57'nci Piyade Alayı for God and glory! The faith of the Ottoman Empire rests in your hands.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Danish, Greek, Norwegian, Romanian, Swedish, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A GeForce GTX 960M card is capable of running the game at a low framerate when playing army based game modes on minimum graphics settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 64-bit or Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space

package_groups.title: Buy Holdfast: Frontlines WW1 - Ottoman Forces
